Package it.apice.sapere.node.networking.impl

This package contains core entities for network management.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Neighbour Interface implemented by all neighbours (actually only BT neighbour).
Subscriber Interface for a generic subscriber.
 

Class Summary
Message  
NeighboursTable The Table where the neighbourIds are mapped on the neighbours.
NetworkManager The class represent the entity which manage the communcations between nodes.
NodeMessage Messages exchanged between nodes.
 

Enum Summary
NodeMessageType Enumeration for the identification of messages between nodes.
 

Package it.apice.sapere.node.networking.impl Description

This package contains core entities for network management.
